attributes.action: No manifesto referendums allowed where the governing party is split on  issue
attributes.background:
The SNP referendum was help by a party that clearly and unambiguously wanted it. The Conservative LEAVE/REMAIN referendum went  'under the radar'. Conservative voters were only vaguely aware that they were voting for a party which planned a referendum.

Just look at the mess the country is now in.

rejection.details: The content of manifestos is the responsibility of political parties, not the Government or Parliament.
